item.title: ğŸ­ Playwright Saucedemo - Pruebas E2E
item.description:
ğŸ­ Playwright Saucedemo - Pruebas E2E Link to heading

Un proyecto completo de pruebas end-to-end usando Playwright para el sitio demo de e-commerce Saucedemo. Este proyecto demuestra las mejores prÃ¡cticas de la industria para pruebas automatizadas con informes detallados, contenedorizaciÃ³n con Docker e integraciÃ³n completa de CI/CD con GitHub Actions. ğŸš€

ğŸŒŸ CaracterÃ­sticas Principales Link to heading

CaracterÃ­stica DescripciÃ³n
ğŸ“¦ Page Object Model Arquitectura de pruebas limpia y mantenible con objetos de pÃ¡gina reutilizables
ğŸ“Š Pruebas Basadas en Datos Datos de prueba separados para fÃ¡cil gestiÃ³n y mantenimiento
ğŸŒ Pruebas Multi-Navegador Soporte para Chromium, Firefox, Webkit y navegadores mÃ³viles
ğŸ³ Soporte Docker Ejecuta pruebas en contenedores aislados con Docker Compose
ğŸ“ˆ Informes Allure Informes interactivos con capturas de pantalla en cada paso
âš™ï¸ CI/CD con GitHub Actions Pruebas automatizadas, informes y despliegue a GitHub Pages
ğŸ“š DocumentaciÃ³n Docusaurus DocumentaciÃ³n hermosa y navegable
ğŸ”„ EjecuciÃ³n Paralela EjecuciÃ³n rÃ¡pida de pruebas en paralelo

ğŸš€ Inicio RÃ¡pido Link to heading 

# Clonar e instalar
git clone https://github.com/anxoportela/playwright-saucedemo.git
cd playwright-saucedemo

# Instalar dependencias
npm install

# Instalar navegadores de Playwright
npm run install:browsers

# Ejecutar pruebas
npm test

ğŸ“ Estructura del Proyecto Link to heading 

playwright-saucedemo/
â”œâ”€â”€ e2e/ # Especificaciones de pruebas E2E
â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ login.spec.js # Pruebas de autenticaciÃ³n
â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ inventory.spec.js # Listado y ordenamiento de productos
â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ cart.spec.js # Operaciones del carrito
â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ checkout.spec.js # Pruebas del flujo de compra
â”‚ â””â”€â”€ logout.spec.js # GestiÃ³n de sesiones
â”œâ”€â”€ pages/ # Clases del Modelo de PÃ¡gina
â”œâ”€â”€ fixtures/ # fixtures personalizados de Playwright
â”œâ”€â”€ test-data/ # Archivos de datos de prueba
â”œâ”€â”€ docs/ # DocumentaciÃ³n Docusaurus
â”œâ”€â”€ .github/workflows/ # CI/CD de GitHub Actions
â”œâ”€â”€ playwright.config.js # ConfiguraciÃ³n de Playwright
â””â”€â”€ docker-compose.yml # Servicios Docker

ğŸ“‹ Cobertura de Pruebas Link to heading

MÃ³dulo Pruebas DescripciÃ³n
ğŸ” Login 4 pruebas Credenciales vÃ¡lidas/invÃ¡lidas, campos vacÃ­os
ğŸ“¦ Inventario 7 pruebas Listado, ordenamiento (A-Z, Z-A, precio)
ğŸ›’ Carrito 5 pruebas Agregar/quitar items, actualizaciones de badge
ğŸ’³ Checkout 6 pruebas Flujo completo, validaciÃ³n, manejo de errores
ğŸšª Logout 3 pruebas TerminaciÃ³n de sesiÃ³n, re-autenticaciÃ³n
ğŸ“Š Total 25 pruebas Cobertura E2E completa

ğŸŒ Matriz de Navegadores Link to heading

Navegador Tipo Estado
Chromium Desktop âœ… Soportado
Firefox Desktop âœ… Soportado
Webkit Desktop âœ… Soportado
Pixel 5 MÃ³vil âœ… Soportado
iPhone 12 MÃ³vil âœ… Soportado

ğŸ“Š Tipos de Informes Link to heading

Informe Comando DescripciÃ³n
HTML npm run test:report Informe HTML estÃ¡ndar de Playwright
JSON npm run test:json Resultados en formato JSON
Allure npm run test:allure Informe interactivo con capturas

ğŸ³ Uso de Docker Link to heading 

# Iniciar contenedor Playwright
docker-compose up -d

# Ejecutar pruebas en contenedor
docker-compose exec playwright npx playwright test

# Detener contenedor
docker-compose down

ğŸ”„ Pipeline CI/CD Link to heading

item.title: ğŸ­ Playwright Saucedemo E2E Testing
item.description:
ğŸ­ Playwright Saucedemo E2E Testing Link to heading

A comprehensive end-to-end testing project using Playwright for the Saucedemo demo e-commerce website. This project demonstrates industry best practices for automated testing with detailed reporting, Docker containerization, and complete CI/CD integration with GitHub Actions. ğŸš€

ğŸŒŸ Key Features Link to heading

Feature Description
ğŸ“¦ Page Object Model Clean and maintainable test architecture with reusable page objects
ğŸ“Š Data-Driven Testing Separate test data for easy management and maintenance
ğŸŒ Multi-Browser Testing Support for Chromium, Firefox, Webkit and mobile browsers
ğŸ³ Docker Support Run tests in isolated containers with Docker Compose
ğŸ“ˆ Allure Reports Interactive test reports with screenshots at each step
âš™ï¸ GitHub Actions CI/CD Automated tests, reporting and deployment to GitHub Pages
ğŸ“š Docusaurus Documentation Beautiful and searchable project documentation
ğŸ”„ Parallel Execution Fast test runs with fully parallel execution

ğŸš€ Quick Start Link to heading 

# Clone and install
git clone https://github.com/anxoportela/playwright-saucedemo.git
cd playwright-saucedemo

# Install dependencies
npm install

# Install Playwright browsers
npm run install:browsers

# Run tests
npm test

ğŸ“ Project Structure Link to heading 

playwright-saucedemo/
â”œâ”€â”€ e2e/ # End-to-end test specifications
â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ login.spec.js # Authentication tests
â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ inventory.spec.js # Product listing and sorting
â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ cart.spec.js # Shopping cart operations
â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ checkout.spec.js # Checkout flow tests
â”‚ â””â”€â”€ logout.spec.js # Session management tests
â”œâ”€â”€ pages/ # Page Object Model classes
â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ loginPage.js # Login page interactions
â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ inventoryPage.js # Inventory page interactions
â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ cartPage.js # Cart page interactions
â”‚ â””â”€â”€ checkoutPage.js # Checkout page interactions
â”œâ”€â”€ fixtures/ # Custom Playwright fixtures
â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ customFixtures.js # Reusable test utilities
â”‚ â””â”€â”€ allureScreenshots.js # Allure screenshot attachment
â”œâ”€â”€ test-data/ # Test data files
â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ credentials.js # User credentials
â”‚ â””â”€â”€ products.js # Product catalog data
â”œâ”€â”€ docs/ # Docusaurus documentation
â”œâ”€â”€ .github/workflows/ # GitHub Actions CI/CD
â”œâ”€â”€ playwright.config.js # Playwright configuration
â””â”€â”€ docker-compose.yml # Docker services

ğŸ“‹ Test Coverage Link to heading

Module Tests Description
ğŸ” Login 4 tests Valid/invalid credentials, empty fields
ğŸ“¦ Inventory 7 tests Product listing, sorting (A-Z, Z-A, price)
ğŸ›’ Cart 5 tests Add/remove items, badge updates
ğŸ’³ Checkout 6 tests Complete flow, validation, error handling
ğŸšª Logout 3 tests Session termination, re-authentication
ğŸ“Š Total 25 tests Complete E2E coverage

ğŸŒ Browser Matrix Link to heading

Browser Type Status
Chromium Desktop âœ… Supported
Firefox Desktop âœ… Supported
Webkit Desktop âœ… Supported
Pixel 5 Mobile âœ… Supported
iPhone 12 Mobile âœ… Supported

ğŸ“Š Report Types Link to heading

Report Command Description
HTML npm run test:report Standard Playwright HTML report
JSON npm run test:json Machine-readable JSON results
Allure npm run test:allure Rich interactive report with screenshots

Allure reports include:
